question: Please define Major Sin (Gunahh -e-Kabirah) and Minor Sin (Gunah-e-Saghirah)? How one can differentiate that the sin which he has perform is a Major Sin or Minor Sin.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
A sin is a sin ? irrespective of the technical classification of the sin. One has to abstain from it.

A slave will not consider what is a major sin or minor crime in the presence of the king. He will abstain from every crime and, in fact, disrespect in the presence of the king.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Muhammad Kadwa
FATWA DEPT.
